topic: Released: 2024 H1 Cumulative Update for Exchange Server
subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Released: 2024 H1 Cumulative Update for Exchange Server
email_text_original:
You don't often get email from philipelder@mpecsinc.ca. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Elevate CMD: 
Setup /DoNotEnableEP 
Don’t run the update via the UI. The law of unintended consequences and the
phone ringing/tickets opening will come into play. 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP
